thread.title: Fireman, solicitor, wrestler: What do footballers do in retirement? Take our quiz
thread.title_full: Fireman, solicitor, wrestler: What do footballers do in retirement? Take our quiz

title: Fireman, solicitor, wrestler: What do footballers do in retirement? Take our quiz
text:
Fireman, wrestler, politician? What do footballers do in retirement? 8 Feb Following ex-Liverpool and QPR striker Djibril Cisse's announcement that he is to retire to focus on a career as a DJ, BBC Sport has unearthed a few more career paths taken by former players. 
Play along with our gallery quiz to see how many you can remember. This content will not work on your device, please check Javascript and cookies are enabled or update your browser Share this page
